Psst : are [you]269-you in on [my]0-i newsletter ?

Hey , [you]269-you ! [You]269-you ’re cordially invited to join [my]0-i list , where [you]269-you ’ll get news , freebies , prizes , fun stuff , early reads , exclusive bits of randomness , and possibly some cat pictures . Okay , for sure cat pictures . It ’s all in the newsletter , [[my]0-i friend]276-my friend ! http://www.annikamartinbooks.com/newletter/

OMG the cute little dog [I]0-i adopted turned out to be [a billionaire]277-a billionaire !

[I]0-i ’m [Vicky]100-vicky , [the dog whisperer]278-the dog whisperer . ( Not really , but that ’s what [[my]0-i elderly neighbor]279-my elderly neighbor always says . ) When [she]279-my elderly neighbor dies , [she]279-my elderly neighbor surprises [everybody]280-everybody by leaving a corporation worth billions to [her]279-my elderly neighbor dog , [Smuckers]101-smuckers . With [me]0-i as [[his]279-my elderly neighbor spokesperson]281-his spokesperson .

Suddenly [I]0-i go from running [[my]0-i Etsy store]282-my etsy store to sitting in [an elegant Wall Street boardroom with Smuckers in [my]0-i lap]283-an elegant wall street boardroom with smuckers in my lap . And [[[my]0-i neighbor]284-my neighbor ’s son , [Henry Locke]102-henry , aka [[New York]1-new york ’s most eligible bachelor]286-new york ’s most eligible bachelor]285-my neighbor ’s son , henry locke , aka new york ’s most eligible bachelor , glaring across the table at [me]0-i .

Rumor has it [Henry]102-henry ’s [a business genius who ’s as talented in [the bedroom]288-the bedroom as [he]102-henry is in [the boardroom]289-the boardroom]287-a business genius who ’s as talented in the bedroom as he is in the boardroom . Sure , [he]102-henry ’s gorgeous . Sex - in - a - seven - thousand dollar suit . But …

[He]102-henry ’s arrogant and infuriating .

[He]102-henry refuses to listen to [me]0-i when [I]0-i insist [I]0-i did n’t con [[his]102-henry mother]290-his mother .

[He]102-henry thinks [he]102-henry can bully [me]0-i , buy [me]0-i off , control [me]0-i , even seduce [me]0-i .

[Henry]102-henry may have [the women of [Manhattan]2-manhattan]291-the women of manhattan eating out of the palm of [his]102-henry hand , but [I]0-i 'm so over [entitled rich guys who think [they]292-entitled rich guys who think they own the world own [the world]293-the world]292-entitled rich guys who think they own the world .

No way will [his]102-henry wicked smile be charming [ME]0-i out of [my]0-i panties .

[His]102-henry wicked ... devastating ... impossible - to - resist smile .

Oh well , who needs panties anyway ?

One

Vicky

[I]0-i ’m smuggling a tiny white dog named [Smuckers]101-smuckers into [a Manhattan hospital]294-a manhattan hospital to see [[his]101-smuckers owner]295-his owner , [Bernadette Locke]103-bernadette . Thanks to a standing appointment at [a chandelier - draped dog salon on [Fifth Avenue]3-fifth avenue]296-a chandelier - draped dog salon on fifth avenue run by [a woman who ostensibly loves dogs but might secretly hate [them]298-them]297-a woman who ostensibly loves dogs but might secretly hate them , [Smuckers]101-smuckers ’s facial fur is blow - dried into such an intense puff of white that [his]101-smuckers eager black eyes and wee raisin of a nose seem to float in a cloud . There are three things to know about [Bernadette]103-bernadette : [She]103-bernadette ’s [the meanest woman [I]0-i ever met]299-the meanest woman i ever met . [She]103-bernadette believes [I]0-i ’m [some kind of dog whisperer]300-some kind of dog whisperer who can read [Smuckers]101-smuckers ’s mind . ( [I]0-i ca n’t . ) And [she]103-bernadette ’s dying . Alone . [The people in [[her]103-bernadette condo building]302-her condo building]301-the people in her condo building will probably be glad to hear of [her]103-bernadette passing . [I]0-i do n’t know what [she]103-bernadette did to earn [their]301-the people in her condo building hatred . That ’s probably for the best . [Bernadette]103-bernadette has [a son]303-a son out there somewhere , but even [he]303-a son seems to have washed [his]303-a son hands of [her]103-bernadette . There is a photo of [the son]304-the son on [[Bernadette]103-bernadette ’s cracked fireplace mantel]305-bernadette ’s cracked fireplace mantel , [a toddler with a scowly little dent between fierce blue eyes]306-a toddler with a scowly little dent between fierce blue eyes . Surrounded by [people]307-people , [the little boy]308-the little boy manages somehow to look utterly alone . Back when [Bernadette]103-bernadette got [her]103-bernadette terminal diagnosis , [I]0-i asked [her]103-bernadette if [she]103-bernadette ’d told [[her]103-bernadette son]309-her son and whether [he]303-a son might finally come to visit . [She]103-bernadette brushed off the question with a contemptuous wave of [her]103-bernadette hand — [Bernadette]103-bernadette ’s favorite way of responding to pretty much anything [you]310-you say is a contemptuous hand wave . [He]303-a son wo n’t be coming , [I]0-i assure [you]310-you . [I]0-i ca n’t believe [he]303-a son would n’t visit [her]103-bernadette , even now . It ’s the ultimate dick move . [[Your]310-you mother]311-your mother is dying alone , [jackass]312-jackass ! Anyway , put all of that in a pot and stir it and [you]310-you have the strange soup of [me]0-i clicking past [a guard]313-a guard , smiling brightly — and hopefully dazzlingly — enough that [he]313-a guard does n’t notice the squirmy bulge in [my]0-i oversized purse . [Smuckers]101-smuckers is a Maltese , which is a toy dog that ’s outrageously cute . And [Smuckers]101-smuckers is the cutest of the cute . [Smuckers]101-smuckers and [Bernadette Locke]103-bernadette made a notorious pair out on [the sidewalk in [the Upper West Side neighborhood]315-the upper west side neighborhood where [[my]0-i little sister]316-my little sister and [I]0-i have [[our]317-our very sweet apartment - sitting gig]318-our very sweet apartment - sitting gig]314-the sidewalk in the upper west side neighborhood where my little sister and i have our very sweet apartment - sitting gig . [I]0-i remember [them]319-them well . [Smuckers]101-smuckers would attract [people]307-people with [his]101-smuckers insane fluff - ball cuteness , but as [the hapless victim]321-the hapless victim drew near [Bernadette]103-bernadette would say something insulting . Kind of like the human equivalent of a Venus flytrap , where the fly is attracted to the beauty of the flower only to be mercilessly crushed . [Locals]322-locals learned to stay away from [the two of [them]323-the two of them]323-the two of them . [I]0-i tried — [I]0-i really did . Yet here [I]0-i am , slipping down [another chillingly bright hospital hallway]324-another chillingly bright hospital hallway , smuggling the little dog in for the third time in two weeks . It ’s not on [my]0-i top ten list of things [I]0-i want to do with [my]0-i day . Not even on [my]0-i top hundred , but [Smuckers]101-smuckers is [[Bernadette]103-bernadette ’s only true friend]325-bernadette ’s only true friend . And [I]0-i know what it ’s like to be hated and alone . [I]0-i know that when [you]326-you ’re hated , [you]326-you sometimes act like [you]326-you do n’t care as a survival method . And that makes [people]307-people hate [you]326-you more , because [they]307-people feel like [you]326-you should look at least a little beaten down . [Bernadette]103-bernadette ’s hatred was real - life neighborhood hatred ; [mine]0-i was real life plus a fun national online component , but it works the same way , and heaven forbid [you]326-you should have a cute dog . Or that a picture of [you]326-you smiling should ever appear on Facebook or Huffpo or [People.com]328-people.com . [I]0-i know , too , how being hated can build on itself , how sometimes [you]326-you do things to make [people]307-people hate [you]326-you more because it ’s better in a certain perverse way . [I]0-i think [only people who have been hated in [their]330-only people who have been hated in their life life]330-only people who have been hated in their life can truly understand that . [I]0-i push into [the room]331-the room . “ [We]2789-we ’re [here]2790-here , ”[0-i] [I]0-i say brightly , relieved [no medical personnel]332-no medical personnel are around . While [Smuckers]101-smuckers enjoys being in a purse , [he]101-smuckers prefers to ride with [his]101-smuckers head out , like [the fierce captain of [a pleather airship]334-a pleather airship]333-the fierce captain of a pleather airship . Needless to say , [he]101-smuckers ’s achieved maximum squirminess . [I]0-i take [him]101-smuckers out . “ Look , [Smuckers]101-smuckers — [[your]101-smuckers mom]2791-your mom ! ”[0-i] [Bernadette]103-bernadette is half propped up on pillows . [Her]103-bernadette skin is sallow and [her]103-bernadette hair sparse , but what hair [she]103-bernadette has is energetically white . [Her]103-bernadette eyes flutter open . “ Finally . ”[103-bernadette] [She]103-bernadette has a tube in [her]103-bernadette arm , but that ’s all . [They]335-they ’ve taken [Bernadette]103-bernadette off everything except morphine . [They]335-they ’ve given up on [her]103-bernadette . “ [Smuckers]101-smuckers is so excited to see [you]103-bernadette . ”[0-i] [I]0-i go over to [her]103-bernadette bed and set [Smuckers]101-smuckers next to [her]103-bernadette . [Smuckers]101-smuckers licks [Bernadette]103-bernadette ’s fingers , and the love that comes over [Bernadette]103-bernadette ’s face makes [her]103-bernadette look soft for a moment . Like [a nice woman]336-a nice woman . “ [Smuckers]101-smuckers , ”[103-bernadette] [she]103-bernadette whispers . [She]103-bernadette moves [her]103-bernadette lips , talking to [him]101-smuckers . [I]0-i ca n’t hear , but [I]0-i know from past conversations that [she]103-bernadette ’s saying [she]103-bernadette loves [him]101-smuckers . Sometimes [she]103-bernadette confesses [she]103-bernadette does n’t want to leave [him]101-smuckers , does n’t want to be alone . [She]103-bernadette ’s frightened about being alone . Feebly [she]103-bernadette scratches [Smuckers]101-smuckers ’s fur , but [she]103-bernadette ’s focusing hard on [me]0-i , whispering something fervently . [I]0-i draw near . [Eggplant]104-eggplant , [she]103-bernadette seems to be saying . “ Are [you]101-smuckers hungry ? ”[103-bernadette] “ [Eggplant]104-eggplant … ”[103-bernadette] [she]103-bernadette says , voice weak . “ Yes , [Bernadette]103-bernadette ? ”[103-bernadette] “ Eggplant makes [your]101-smuckers complexion … ”[103-bernadette] [she]103-bernadette winces hard , “ … wormlike . ”[103-bernadette] [She]103-bernadette manages to infuse the word wormlike with incredulous contempt , as though [I]0-i ’ve performed such a feat of fashion monstrosity that [she]103-bernadette needs to muster all [her]103-bernadette strength to let [me]0-i know . “ Damn . [I]0-i was going for slug - like , ”[0-i] [I]0-i joke as [I]0-i adjust [Smuckers]101-smuckers so that [he]101-smuckers ’s not on [her]103-bernadette tube . [She]103-bernadette sniffs and turns back to [Smuckers]101-smuckers . Over the three years [I]0-i ’ve known [her]103-bernadette , [Bernadette]103-bernadette has always been judgmental about [my]0-i fashion choices . Did [you]337-you get that out of a 1969 catalog for [librarians]338-librarians , [Vicky]100-vicky ? Did [JCPenney]105-jcpenney have a sale on drab pencil skirts ? At times [I]0-i literally seem to hurt [her]103-bernadette eyes , what with [my]0-i uninspired ponytails and glasses and whatnot . [I]0-i have this suspicion that [Bernadette]103-bernadette came from money but that [her]103-bernadette fortune dwindled over the years . Clue one : [[her]103-bernadette apartment]339-her apartment is in [an expensive neighborhood]340-an expensive neighborhood , but [it]339-her apartment ’s really shabby inside , like [it]339-her apartment was once grand and went to ruin . Also , [her]103-bernadette clothes are worn versions of what was expensive maybe fifteen years back . Really , [she]103-bernadette seems to spend nothing on [herself]103-bernadette . But [Smuckers]101-smuckers ? Nothing is too good for [Smuckers]101-smuckers . No expense spared . [I]0-i take [her]103-bernadette hand and put it where [Smuckers]101-smuckers most likes it so [Smuckers]101-smuckers will settle down . “ [Smuckers]101-smuckers , ”[103-bernadette] [she]103-bernadette breathes . [I]0-i have this impulse to set a comforting hand on [her]103-bernadette arm , but human contact is not something [Bernadette]103-bernadette would ever want from [me]0-i . [I]0-i ’m really only around as an extension of [Smuckers]101-smuckers , a conduit for [Smuckers]101-smuckers ’s important communications . Other than that , [I]0-i ’m chopped liver . If [Bernadette]103-bernadette could somehow automate [me]0-i or keep [me]0-i in a sardine tin with just the corner rolled up so [my]0-i voice can escape , [she]103-bernadette would . [She]103-bernadette looks up at [me]0-i expectantly . [I]0-i know what [she]103-bernadette wants . What does [Smuckers]101-smuckers have to say ? [I]0-i ’m at a loss for what to say , or rather , what [Smuckers]101-smuckers might say . [I]0-i never signed up for this pet whisperer thing with [her]103-bernadette , and what with [her]103-bernadette being on [her]103-bernadette deathbed , it seems especially wrong . But [she]103-bernadette ’s waiting . [Glaring]106-glaring . It ’s [Smuckers]101-smuckers or nothing . [I]0-i suck in a breath and put on [my]0-i whisperer expression , which [I]0-i would describe as a curious listening face . “ [Smuckers]101-smuckers says that [you]103-bernadette should n’t be afraid to die , ”[0-i] [I]0-i say . [She]103-bernadette waits . [She]103-bernadette wants more . “ [He]101-smuckers wants [you]103-bernadette to know it ’s going to be okay , even though it might not feel like that right now . ”[103-bernadette] [She]103-bernadette nods , mumbles to [Smuckers]101-smuckers . In terms of subject matter , this is getting into new territory . [Smuckers]101-smuckers has typically confined [himself]101-smuckers to lifestyle commentary — requests for certain styles of neck scritching or flavors of Fancy Whiskas dog treats . Now and then [he]101-smuckers ’ll speculate on the antics of pigeons outside the window . [He]101-smuckers has certainly never betrayed any divine wisdom about death or special understanding of esoteric secrets of the cosmos . But [I]0-i can tell from [Bernadette]103-bernadette ’s face that [she]103-bernadette likes hearing that [Smuckers]101-smuckers said that . “ [Vicky]100-vicky , ”[103-bernadette] [she]103-bernadette says to [Smuckers]101-smuckers . “ [Vicky]100-vicky will care for [you]100-vicky . ”[103-bernadette] “ [You]103-bernadette know [I]0-i will , [Bernadette]103-bernadette , ”[0-i] [I]0-i say . “ [I]0-i ’ll care for [Smuckers]101-smuckers as if [he]101-smuckers were [my]0-i own flesh and blood . ”[0-i] Though not literally . [I]0-i do n’t plan on racing around [Central Park]4-central park eating goose poop with [him]101-smuckers . “ [He]101-smuckers ’ll live like [a little king]2792-a little king , ”[0-i] [I]0-i amend . [Bernadette]103-bernadette mumbles something and [I]0-i settle into the surprisingly luxurious , leather - upholstered chair in [the roomy private room [they]342-they ’ve given [her]103-bernadette]341-the roomy private room they ’ve given her . [Bernadette]103-bernadette scritches [Smuckers]101-smuckers ’s neck . “ Love [you]101-smuckers , [Pokey]107-pokey , ”[103-bernadette] [she]103-bernadette whispers . [I]0-i quietly scroll through Instagram , one ear attuned to the door , but all [I]0-i hear is the sound of footsteps and muted conversations going up and down [the hall]344-the hall , along with the occasional intercom announcement . [I]0-i want to make this visit last as long as possible . [Smuckers]101-smuckers will live like [a little king]2792-a little king , but maybe not [a king of [a wealthy country]347-a wealthy country]346-a king of a wealthy country . More like [a king of [an impoverished nation]349-an impoverished nation]348-a king of an impoverished nation , but one that loves [[their]342-they king]350-their king . That ’s the best [I]0-i can do for [him]101-smuckers . [I]0-i took [Smuckers]101-smuckers home two weeks ago , the day before [Bernadette]103-bernadette went into [the hospital]351-the hospital . Five

Vicky

The first board meeting takes place on a Wednesday at [Locke Companies headquarters]19-locke companies . [I]0-i enter the address from the sheet [the lawyer]680-the lawyer gave [me]0-i into [my]0-i phone . It ’s an easy subway ride . [The headquarters]971-the headquarters turns out to be [one of [those grand Financial District buildings]973-those grand financial district buildings]972-one of those grand financial district buildings , gleaming white stone and glass shooting high up into the sky . The doorway is actually a bank of doorways that seems designed to illustrate the concept of redundancy . There ’s a revolving door , an automatic single door , a single door for [people with handicaps]974-people with handicaps , a double door for [people with handicaps]974-people with handicaps , an automatic double door , a nonautomatic single door , and one last door , added , perhaps , as an insult to the undecided , next to which [a uniformed attendant]976-a uniformed attendant stands . Above is a row of blue flags , flapping in the wind . Specifically they are Royal Blue 1 — that ’s the Locke Worldwide corporate color . The floors are an expanse of sparkling white tile sweeping out to a balcony edged with grass and furniture more appropriate to a chic lounge bar . The walls are composed of giant sparkling blue tile with a glow that comes from cracks between the tiles . Yes , that ’s the way [the place]995-the place is lit — a glow between tiles ! Seven

[Vicky]100-vicky [I]0-i ca n’t believe how close [I]0-i came to signing it all away . [Henry]127-henry is smart . And [he]127-henry ’s willing to play dirty . In another [I]0-i discover a check for seventy - five thousand dollars , one month ’s pay for being on the board . [I]0-i stare at it a long time . Eight

Nine

Vicky

[I]0-i take [Carly]99-carly and [Smuckers]101-smuckers out to [a sidewalk café where [we]1211-we order whatever [we]1211-we want without looking at the prices]1210-a sidewalk café where we order whatever we want without looking at the prices , and for dessert [we]1211-we get [our]1211-we favorite treat : ice cream with a stupid amount of candy in it . “ Everything ’s good now , ”[99-carly] [Carly]99-carly says , searching [my]0-i face for confirmation . “ Def , ”[0-i] [I]0-i say , because [I]0-i want that for [her]99-carly , even if [I]0-i do n’t have it for [myself]0-i . Thirteen

Vicky

[I]0-i take it and open it . [I]0-i should ’ve trusted [you]99-carly . Let [me]0-i fight for [us]2041-us .

Twenty - Three

Thirty - One
